title: Pizza
itunes:title: Pizza
description:
In this episode, the team discusses pizza with Pizza Today Magazine columnist and founder of Scott's Pizza Tours, Scott Wiener.

Follow Scott on Instagram @ScottsPizzaTours and on Twitter @ScottsPizzaTour !

Follow Scott's nationwide nonprofit Slice Out Hunger @SliceOutHunger on Instagram and Twitter.

Our merch store is now live! Go to idontknowaboutthat.com for shirts, hoodies, mugs, and more!

Subscribe to our Patreon at patreon.com/IDKAT for ad free episodes, bonus episodes, and more exclusive perks! Tiers start at just $2!

Go to JimJefferies.com to buy tickets to Jim's upcoming tour, The Moist Tour.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
